title: The Human eye
brief_description: Shows the structure and properties of the human eye. Using models, animated diagrams and photography, the film explains lens, iris, sclera, cornea, aqueous humor, retina, cones, neruons, the choroid layer and the fovea centralis. Suitable for secondary level.
